entry.title: SBF Charged with Conspiracy, Wire Fraud, Money Laundering by Justice Department, Securities Violations by SEC
entry.summary: Former FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried will not be able to testify before Congress as expected.

entry.title: FTX Founder Sam Bankman-Fried Arrested in Bahamas
entry.summary: The arrest "followed receipt of formal notification from the United States that it has filed criminal charges against SBF," according to a police statement.

entry.title: How MNTGE Is Bringing Authentic Vintage Fashion Into the Metaverse
entry.summary: Retro fashion and streetwear are 3D-scanned and turned into digital wearables under the keen eye of designer Sean Wotherspoon.

entry.title: 'Grossly Inexperienced and Unsophisticated' Leadership Caused FTX Collapse, Says New CEO
entry.summary: John J. Ray III, who is overseeing the crypto exchange’s bankruptcy process, also claims that "FTX US was not operated independently of FTX.com."

entry.title: Law Enforcement Requests at Coinbase Spike in Last Year
entry.summary: The leading exchange has revealed that government agency requests for user data are up 66%, seeing over 12,000 inquiries this year.

entry.title: Chinese Police Arrest Group for Laundering $1.7B in Crypto
entry.summary: Despite a nationwide crackdown on cryptocurrency, Chinese criminal organizations are still using digital assets to skirt the law.

entry.title: Reddit Users Have Minted More Than 5 Million NFT Avatars on Polygon
entry.summary: Reddit’s NFT program is onboarding users into Web3, with more than 4.25 million unique wallets holding the Polygon assets.

entry.title: SBF Says He Isn't Attending DC Hearing in Person Due to 'Paparazzi Effect'
entry.summary: The disgraced ex-CEO of the collapsed FTX empire also said he expects his testimony to be “underwhelming.”

entry.title: Coinbase Stock Hits New All-Time Low Amid Plummeting Revenues
entry.summary: Coinbase’s stock (COIN) continues to slide as the exchange braces for year-end figures that grossly underperform its 2021 numbers.

entry.title: The Knights Who Say Nah are Turning Historical Artifacts Into NFTs
entry.summary: This NFT collection is blending PFPs, digitized historical artifacts and storytelling to create a unique narrative project.

entry.title: US Justice Dept Mulling Criminal Charges Against Binance Founder CZ: Report
entry.summary: Discussions between Binance attorneys and Department of Justice officials have reportedly included potential plea deals.

entry.title: Former SEC Regulator: Binance's Proof of Reserves Audit 'How I Define Red Flag’
entry.summary: The compliance veteran said Binance’s report didn't address internal financial controls and that it lacks an “assurance conclusion.”

entry.title: Tron's Justin Sun 'Deploying More Capital' to Stop Stablecoin USDD's Slide
entry.summary: Justin Sun posted a meme riffing on Terra's Do Kwon as Tron's native stablecoin USDD slipped to $0.97 on Monday.

entry.title: Arkansas Electric Utility to Offer Energy Sweetener to Battered Crypto Miners
entry.summary: A special electricity tariff is being offered to the crypto miners by the Arkansas’ biggest power utility.

entry.title: South Korean Authorities Say Terraform Labs CEO Do Kwon in Serbia: Report
entry.summary: South Korean authorities indicate that Terra's Do Kwon, also wanted by Interpol, moved to Serbia but could now be in a neighboring country.

entry.title: Dogecoin Plummets 9% as Crypto Markets Flash Red
entry.summary: Dogecoin has led overnight losses among the market's top 10 largest cryptocurrencies, shedding around 9% over the past 24 hours.

entry.title: SEC Chair Gary Gensler Must Testify Before Congress, Says Rep. Tom Emmer
entry.summary: The Minnesota representative said Gensler’s agency has failed to gather critical information from crypto companies.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Sam Bankman-Fried ‘Willing to Testify,' Crypto’s New Bottom Signal, Stablecoin Wars Rage On
entry.summary: Besides dunking on disgraced crypto founders, Twitternauts found time to tinker with the latest AI tech.

entry.title: 'Abnormal' Altcoin Trading on Binance 'Just Market Behavior,' Says CEO
entry.summary: The company says the observed activity had nothing to do with compromised accounts or leaked API keys.

entry.title: U.S. Senator Says He Sees 'No Reason Why' Crypto Exists
entry.summary: Montana Sen. Jon Tester says that regulating crypto will encourage "people to think it's real."

entry.title: gm: Tezos Co-Founder Kathleen Breitman Sounds Off on FTX Collapse
entry.summary: Tezos co-founder Kathleen Breitman has been in crypto since the beginning and has seen a lot of cycles and failures. She joined Stacy Elliott and Dan Roberts and brought the fire on FTX and Sam Bankman-Fried’s mismanagement, “decentralization theater,” Tezos’s reputation and positioning, crypto sports marketing, and NFTs. Watch Episode 25 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin and Ethereum Flat Again, Axie Infinity Sees Rare Jump
entry.summary: Bitcoin and Ethereum traded sideways all week, with the market offering only a few green shoots. Elsewhere, SBF looks set to testify on Tuesday.

entry.title: Why Some SushiSwap Stakers Are Jumping Ship
entry.summary: SushiSwap's Head Chef is calling for drastic measures to keep the DeFi project's future alive and well.

entry.title: Lawsuit Alleges Yuga Labs Conspired With Celebs Like Justin Bieber to Push Bored Ape NFTs
entry.summary: The class action suit alleges that MoonPay and Guy Oseary worked with Yuga Labs to covertly pay celebrities to boost the popular NFT project.

entry.title: Crypto.com Releases Data to Assure Clients It Holds One-to-One Reserves
entry.summary: The proof-of-reserves study was conducted by independent firm Mazars.

entry.title: Crypto Brokerage FalconX Discloses It Has Funds Stuck on FTX
entry.summary: In the event of a worst-case scenario, FalconX said it has “decades of runway,” meaning that it has enough capital on hand to continue operating.

entry.title: Raising in a Bear Market: Slow Ventures, Volt Capital, Conviction, AngelBlock at 0xpo Summit
entry.summary: Clay Robbins of Slow Ventures, Soona Amhaz of Volt Capital, Sarah Guo of Conviction and formerly Greylock, and Alex Strzesniewski of AngelBlock joined Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Summit in San Francisco on November 3 for an extensive panel on raising venture money even during Crypto Winter.

entry.title: SBF Denies He Tried to Attack Tether, 'Hunted' Three Arrows’ Terra Positions
entry.summary: In almost identical statements—one to the NYT and another on Twitter—the former FTX CEO denies trying to make UST and USDT lose their pegs to the dollar.

entry.title: 'No One Won': Binance CEO CZ Again Clashes With Sam Bankman-Fried
entry.summary: Relitigating the past, Binance boss CZ and ex-FTX CEO SBF again trade barbs over a business deal gone bad.

entry.title: Starbucks Sees 'Unprecedented Interest' as Polygon NFT Rewards Platform Launches
entry.summary: The coffee giant’s new Starbucks Odyssey rewards program opened up for select beta testers ahead of expansion in 2023.

entry.title: UK Includes Crypto Assets in Financial Services Reform Package
entry.summary: Rishi Sunak’s government is pushing forward with plans to turn the United Kingdom into a global hub for crypto assets.

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried 'Willing' to Testify Before House Financial Services Committee
entry.summary: The former FTX CEO's decision comes after a public exchange of tweets with the committee's chair Maxine Waters.

entry.title: SEC Urges Firms to Disclose Crypto Exposure in New Letter
entry.summary: Citing securities law, the SEC is now asking firms about any relevant exposure to the chaotic crypto industry.

entry.title: Coinbase Announces Zero-Fee USDT to USDC Stablecoin Conversion
entry.summary: The stablecoin wars rage on as Coinbase rolls out zero-fee conversions from Tether to Circle's USDC.

entry.title: Binance CEO CZ Takes On Renown Skeptic Paul Krugman In Cryptocurrency MasterClass
entry.summary: In a wide-ranging conversation, the pair debate the value and potential of crypto.

entry.title: Tensions Erupt Between Magic Eden and Metaplex Over Future of Solana NFTs
entry.summary: Metaplex accused Magic Eden of attempting to take over the NFT protocol as power players battle over royalties and decentralization.

entry.title: FTC Could Curb Microsoft's Metaverse Ambitions with Activision Lawsuit
entry.summary: Is it “game over” for Microsoft's purchase of Activision Blizzard, developers of Call of Duty?

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Jump With Stocks on Jobs Report Release
entry.summary: Crypto rose along with the U.S. stock market today.

entry.title: OpenSea Again Changes Course on NFT Royalties After More Creator Pushback
entry.summary: Amid complaints over its “malware” tool, as Art Blocks CEO Erick Calderon called it, the top NFT marketplace revises its stance.

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried's Lawyer Parents to Drop Teaching at Stanford in 2023: Report
entry.summary: The mother of the fallen FTX founder says her retirement has “nothing to do with” the crypto scandal.

entry.title: Senator Warren Wants the Fed to Answer for Banking Sector’s Ties to FTX
entry.summary: Senators Elizabeth Warren and Tina Smith also wrote letters demanding answers from the FDIC and the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency.

entry.title: Ethereum Devs Plan to Enable Staked ETH Withdrawals by March 2023
entry.summary: Ethereum core developers have targeted spring for the network’s upcoming Shanghai upgrade. But to get users their money, they may have to make some sacrifices.

entry.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Bored Ape Yacht Club Wins NFT Project of the Year
entry.summary: Illa Da Producer accepted the Cryptie on behalf of Yuga Labs from presenter Alanna Roazzi-Laforet at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Moonbirds, Azuki, DeGods, and CloneX.

entry.title: The Crypties 2022: Art Blocks Founder Wins Industry Achievement Award
entry.summary: Art Blocks founder Erick Calderon accepted the industry achievement award from presenter Clara Tsao of Filecoin Foundation at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30.

entry.title: The Crypties 2022: BFF Wins Diversity Award
entry.summary: Rachel Weiss and Jackie Courtney accepted the Cryptie for BFF from presenter Rebecca Barkin of Lamina1 at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were WomenRise, Boys Club, and The Hug.

entry.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Crypto Unicorns Wins Game of the Year
entry.summary: Katrina Wolfe accepted the Cryptie for Crypto Unicorns from presenter Avery Akkineni of Vayner3 at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Stepn, Zed Run, and Blankos Block Party.

entry.title: The Crypties 2022: Celo Wins Social Impact Award
entry.summary: Marek Olszewski accepted the Cryptie for Celo from presenter Dan Roberts of Decrypt Media at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Ukraine DAO, Dream DAO, Proof of Protest, and Digital Diaspora.

entry.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: People of Crypto Wins Metaverse Event of the Year
entry.summary: Simone Berry and Akbar Hamid accepted the Cryptie for People of Crypto's Metaverse Pride Parade from presenter Toni Thai Sterrett of Bad Grrls Creative Club at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Decentraland's Metaverse Fashion Week and Heal from The Sandbox and Code Green.

entry.title: The Crypties 2022: Doodles Collab With Shopify Wins Mainstream Award
entry.summary: Shirley Cedeno and Akbar Hamid accepted the Cryptie on behalf of Doodles from presenters Igor Lilic and Gabriela Ramos Lilic of Breakout at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were RTFKT and Nike, Gmoney and Adidas, Tiffany and CryptoPunks, and TIMEpieces.

entry.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Lens Protocol Wins DeFi Project of the Year
entry.summary: Bradley Freeman and Christina Beltramini accepted the Cryptie for Lens Protocol from presenter Jordan Garbis of BeetsDAO at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Aave, dYdX, and OlympusDAO.

entry.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Coinbase Ventures Wins Investor of the Year
entry.summary: Shan Aggarwal accepted the Cryptie for Coinbase Ventures from presenter Amanda Cassatt of Serotonin at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Paradigm, a16z, and Polychain.

entry.title: Blocknative CEO Matt Cutler at 0xpo Crossroads
entry.summary: Blocknative's Matt Cutler sat down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Crossroads in San Francisco on November 3 to tell his Web3 origin story and Blocknative's business—plus misconceptions in the crypto space.

entry.title: Fintech Lawyer: Crypto Companies Need to Seek Legal Advice Before Launch
entry.summary: Lisa Rubin, a blockchain attorney with Paul Hastings, sat down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Crossroads in San Francisco on November 3 to discuss legal misconceptions the industry still holds.

entry.title: Phantom Co-Founder Francesco Agosti at 0xpo Crossroads
entry.summary: One of the minds behind the popular Solana dapp sits down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Crossroads in San Francisco on November 3 to discuss the history of Phantom and what he’s looking forward to in Web3.

entry.title: NFT Storytelling: Jason Michael Primrose, Amanda Terry, Artemysia-X, Kas Vegas at Camp Decrypt 2022
entry.summary: "Lost Children of Andromeda" author Jason Michael Primrose, Amanda Terry of Metagood and ACTAI Ventures, Artemysia-X of Rug Radio program LorePlay, and Kas Vegas of NFT INT, Huxley, and Feature.io all discussed how their work utilizes NFTs for storytelling, on a lively panel at Camp Decrypt moderated by What's Trending podcast host Shira Lazar.

entry.title: Edward Snowden Talks Tornado Cash Sanctions, Ethereum Merge, DAOs and NFTs at Camp Decrypt 2022
entry.summary: In an extensive talk with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Camp Decrypt in Napa CA in October, Edward Snowden gave his candid views on the Ethereum merge, the sanctioning of Ethereum mixer Tornado Cash by the U.S. government, the privacy shortcomings of Bitcoin and Ethereum, and his view on using DAOs to source tips from whistleblowers.

entry.title: The New Landscape for NFT Drops: Bad Grrls Creative Club, BeetsDAO, and Cymbal at Camp Decrypt 2022
entry.summary: Amid a crypto bear market and recent declines in NFT sales volume, what's the new roadmap for new NFT collections? What's expected by community members and collectors? Toni Thai Sterrett of Bad Grrls Creative Club, Jordan Garbis of BeetsDAO, and Eric Feng of NFT block explorer discussed with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at Camp Decrypt Napa.

entry.title: Musician 3LAU on His Music NFT Platform Royal: 'We Take Compliance Really Seriously'
entry.summary: Justin Blau aka 3LAU, CEO of Royal, talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin about building his company around compliance from the start. "We take compliance so seriously that it might make us move a little bit slower... but we think that's really how we have to build in the space." He also said he looks to Coinbase as a model.

entry.title: FTX Meltdown 101: What the Hell Happened and What Comes Next
entry.summary: In less than a week, one of the largest and most trusted crypto exchanges went up in flames, along with its crypto celebrity founder and CEO Sam Bankman-Fried. Dan Roberts, Stacy Elliott, and Kate Irwin walk you through exactly how it happened, what it means for you, their own takes on the most interesting subplots, and what we can learn from it all. Plus: We review some comments SBF and CZ made on this podcast that look remarkable in hindsight. Watch Episode 23 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: Justin Sun On the Future of Tron's USDD Stablecoin
entry.summary: The Tron founder tells Decrypt about the network's decentralized stablecoin USDD, and how Tron aims to "bridge the Web3 world with the real world.
